document_data.name: Harbor Bottom Whisky
document_data.mainbody: '''Harbor Bottom Whisky''' was a type of cheap [[whiskey]] commonly found in taverns of [[Daggerford]] such as the [[Black Stone Inn]] and [[Happy Cow]].
document_data.Description: This potent rot-gut whiskey was notoriously foul-tasting. Its flavor palate was often described as something found deep in the muck of a seafloor. However, its extreme potency and cheap price made it popular with sailors of Daggerford around [[1372 DR]].
